traits.name: Paragon Power
traits.desc:
At the end of another creature's turn, you may regain one reaction and choose one of the following:
A. Act: Tane an action. You may also spend one or all of your remaining movement as part of that action.
B. Resist: Reroll a saving throw against an ongoing effect. Spend 6 hit points to gain advantage on the roll.

traits.name: Consume the Weak
traits.desc: When you hit a target with an attack and the target is bloodied, you deal 3 additional damage.

traits.name: Firebolt
traits.desc: Spell: Cantrip, Evocation, VSM. Ranged: +7 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) fire damage.

traits.name: Booming Touch
traits.desc: Spell: 1st level, Evocation, VS. Melee: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: The creature is doomed. Doom: 14 (4d6) thunder damage and the target deal 5 thunder damage to all other creatures within 5 ft.

traits.name: Acid Shower
traits.desc: Spell: 1st level, Evocation, VS. Ranged: DC 15 vs Dexterity, range 30 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (3d6) ongoing acid damage.

traits.name: Electrocution Rift
traits.desc: Spell: 2nd level, Evocation, VS. Ranged: DC 15 vs Dexterity, a 20 ft. sphere centered on a point within 60 ft. of you, all creatures. Hit: 15 lightning damage.

traits.name: Shocking Grasp
traits.desc: Spell: Cantrip, Evocation, S. Melee: +7 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) lightning damage.

traits.name: Failing Protection Ward
traits.desc: While you are bloodied, decrease your AC by 1.
